title: New: Ajimal – This Human Joy
content:
Alongside M O N E Y and Jamie Isaac, the North East’s very own Ajimal does disconsolate melancholy as well as anyone in the UK.

Having impressed on the pages of CitR before, it’s fantastic to have him back, with new track This Human Joy, a swirling, intoxicating number, that showcases the majestic, pensive side to Ajimal. For a song so sombre, it’s ultimately rather uplifting, and one of the finest tracks of 2013 thus far. Check it out below. (Premiered via LOBF)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
